entities.name: Agency
entities.description: The main entity storing core information about a government agency.

properties.name: agency_name
properties.description: The full name of the agency.

properties.name: agency_type
properties.description: The full name of the agency.

entities.name: Agency_Hierarchy
entities.description: A self-referencing table to handle parent-child relationships between agencies.

properties.name: parent_agency_id
properties.description: Foreign key to the parent Agency.

properties.name: child_agency_id
properties.description: Foreign key to the child Agency.

entities.name: AgencyContactInfo
entities.description: Contact details including phone numbers, emails, and physical addresses.

relationships.description: An agency can be a parent to multiple child agencies.
An agency can have multiple contact details.
